snippet.title: ENDRR teaser - EN
snippet.description:
Live an adventure Roguelike with ENDRR, the very first game of Waïju Games.
Dive into this pixel art world where ennemies become stronger and stronger, as you continuously improve your skills. How many waves can you survive ? 

We are independant and would love to hear from you !
Contact us : waiju.contact@gmail.com
